nodes.bodyText: Did they share the same entity type or were the all of them a ZombieEntity just with a flag
EntityType didn't exist back then in the code, there was only Class<? extends Entity>. They were all the same class with just this flag.
I'd probably say they were the same entity then in the comment
"same entity" would imply to me that they are the same entity instance
Maybe "same type of entity"? That'd work around "entity type" being taken while still meaning the same time.
